sentences.en: 'I am not very sure whether he's sane.'
sentences.cn: 我说, “ 我都吃不准他脑子是否正常. ”

sentences.en: a sane and sensible approach to gun control
sentences.cn: 一个明智而又合理的枪支管制方法。

sentences.en: And I don't believe I should ever be quite sane again!
sentences.cn: 而且我相信我不会再度正常了.

sentences.en: By declaring him sane, the jury implied that he had a moral sense.
sentences.cn: 陪审团宣称他神志清醒, 是指他有辨明是非的能力.

sentences.en: By lack of understanding they remained sane.
sentences.cn: 他们不具备理解力,于是他们心安理得.

sentences.en: He seems perfectly sane (= completely sane ) to me.
sentences.cn: 在我看来他神志完全正常。

sentences.en: He was perfectly sane when he committed the crime.
sentences.cn: 他犯罪时,神志十分清醒.

sentences.en: He was quite sane, yet he hated those men at mealtime.
sentences.cn: 他的神志非常清醒, 可是,每逢吃饭的时候,他免不了要恨这些人.

sentences.en: He was sane at the time of the murder.
sentences.cn: 在凶杀案发生时他的神志是清醒的.

sentences.en: I need you sane and sober.
In spite of the extremity of her seclusion she was sane.
sentences.cn: 尽管完全与世隔绝，她依然心智健全。

sentences.en: It is not easy to become sane.'
sentences.cn: 要神志健全,不是容易的事. ”

sentences.en: It wasn't the act of a sane person.
sentences.cn: 心智健全的人做不出这种事来。

sentences.en: No sane person wishes to see conflict or casualties.
sentences.cn: 理智的人都不愿意看到冲突或伤亡。

sentences.en: No sane person would want to kill a baby.
sentences.cn: 神志正常的人不会去杀一个婴儿。

sentences.en: She seemed a sane , well - balanced sort of person.
sentences.cn: 她看来是那种明智稳健的人.

sentences.en: You must humble yourself before you can become sane.'
sentences.cn: 你先要知道自卑,然后才能神志健全. ”

words.tran_cn: 稳健地；心智健全地；理智地
心智健全；清醒，通情达理
明智；头脑清楚；精神健全；通情达理

trans.tran_cn: 心智健全的，神志正常的，明智的，稳健的
trans.tran_en: able to think in a normal and reasonable way

trans.tran_cn: (Sane)人名；(日)实(姓)；(日)实(名)；(芬、塞、冈、几比、塞内)萨内
